about_the_game:
Take on the challenge in Endless Mode with the Master!
Quick, fierce attacks, superb single output to blow up the enemy!

The Master's attack is different from other characters
- A quick jab can interrupt an enemy's attack first
- Followed by a five-strike combo with a pushing palm for all-around suppression
- The final kamehameha (only hand gestures XD) breaks the enemy's defenses

In addition, the master's kicks are also very powerful
- A dash attack with a flying kick can be combined with a five-strike pushing palm
- Heavy attack is a unique combo of three kicks

Initial Skills
- All-rounded infantry
- Casting healing magic on the surrounding area
- Increases soldiers' attack power significantly

Please continue to support the Oki Game Lab and come experience the mystery of Kung Fu!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX
  • Processor: Intel i3 6th generation
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Legendary Knight - Master

  • Processor: Intel i3 6th generation
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 530
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
